name: The Lone Ranger
overview: In the western desert plains, a desolate landscape is cut by the railroad that will connect the two coasts of the North American continent. The railway is a steamroller that destroys everything in its path, farmers, ranchers, towns and Indian tribes … for this he has taken control of an army of armed men and also has the support of the government who sent troops. All this so that nothing can stop the railroad. In a skirmish between some ranchers and the railroad gunmen, our protagonist is left for dead, his land is confiscated, and his entire world disappears. When he wakes up in the desert, he decides to come back as a masked man and get revenge on the railroad. But not only are the railroad and its henchmen the only dangers our lone vigilante faces, there are also dangerous animals on the plains and of course the plains Indians who are on the warpath and attack all those who enter. in their lands... Fight your way with your revolver and the aid of your horse to those at the head of the railroad company...
